description: Comprehensive MITRE ATT&CK integration guidance for professional threat intelligence analysis
integration_template: Include relevant MITRE ATT&CK technique references in format: '[T1566.001] Phishing: Spearphishing Attachment' or '[TA0001] Initial Access: Exploit Public-Facing Application'. Focus on techniques that are most relevant to the reported threats and provide specific detection implications.

formatting_guidelines.placement: Include technique references after specific threat descriptions
formatting_guidelines.context: Provide brief explanation of how the technique relates to the reported threat

detection_guidance.include_detection_indicators: For each technique referenced, include relevant detection methods or log sources

log_sources.T1190: Web application logs, WAF alerts, IDS/IPS signatures
log_sources.T1566: Email gateway logs, user reporting, endpoint detection
log_sources.T1110: Authentication logs, account lockout events, MFA alerts
log_sources.T1055: Endpoint detection, process monitoring, memory analysis

detection_guidance.response_priorities: Align response recommendations with specific techniques identified

examples: Attackers are using [T1566.001] Phishing: Spearphishing Attachment to deliver malicious payloads, requiring monitoring of email attachment sandboxing and user reporting systems
The CVE enables [TA0001] Initial Access via [T1190] Exploit Public-Facing Application, detectable through web application firewall alerts and unusual HTTP request patterns
Observed [T1071.001] Application Layer Protocol: Web Requests for C2 communications, indicating need for DNS and network traffic analysis
Attackers leverage [T1110.001] Brute Force: Password Cracking against exposed services, detectable through authentication failure monitoring and account lockout events
Ransomware activity involves [TA0040] Impact with [T1486] Data Encrypted for Impact, requiring monitoring of file system modifications and backup systems

executive_reporting.technique_summarization: Group techniques by MITRE ATT&CK tactics for executive clarity
executive_reporting.business_impact: Explain technique relevance in business terms (e.g., 'initial access methods' vs 'data theft capabilities')
executive_reporting.detection_priorities: Highlight techniques most critical for early detection and response
